com.buyanova.service

Interface RaceService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RaceServiceImpl

    public interface RaceService
    RaceService interface is used to describe business logic concerning Race entity.
    See Also:
    RaceServiceImpl

    • Method Summary

      Returns list of races that happened in the past(their date is before the current date) of size size starting from indexFrom position.

      Returns number of past races(their date is before current date) in the data source.

      Returns Race object with the full information about the race from the data source.

      Returns list of races that have already finished (their date is before the current date), but their horse winners are not specified in the data source.

      Returns list of races that are happening in the future(their date is after the current date).

      Returns list of races that are happening in the future(their date is after the current date) and there are no odds for the horses that participate in them.

    • Method Detail

      • addRace

        void addRace(Race race)
      throws ServiceException
        Adds new race to the data source.

        Note: races with the past date won't be added and an exception will be thrown.

        Parameters:
        race - race that is to be added
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if null race is passed, if race contains invalid fields, if a data source access error occurs

      • setRaceResults

        void setRaceResults(Race race)
             throws ServiceException
        Sets the horse winner of the race in the data source.

        The method will execute successfully if and only if the horse winner is not specified, otherwise an exception is thrown.

        It automatically updates users' and bookmaker's balances according to their bets and odds. Horses' statistics is also updated.

        Parameters:
        race - race which results are to be set
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if null race is passed, if horse winner is already specified in the data source if horse winner did not perform in the race, if a data source access error occurs

      • updateRace

        void updateRace(Race race)
         throws ServiceException
        Updates information about the race in the data source.

        Note: horse winner field should not be considered and changed. To get the information about updating this field see setRaceResults(Race)

        Parameters:
        race - race that is to be updated
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if null race is passed, if race contains invalid fields, if a data source access error occurs

      • removeRace

        void removeRace(Race race)
         throws ServiceException
        Removes race from the data source.
        Parameters:
        race - race that is to be removed
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if null race is passed, if a data source access error occurs

      • getRacesWithoutResults

        java.util.List<Race> getRacesWithoutResults()
                                     throws ServiceException
        Returns list of races that have already finished (their date is before the current date), but their horse winners are not specified in the data source.
        Returns:
        list of past races without results
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if a data source access error occurs

      • addHorseToRace

        void addHorseToRace(int horseId,
                    int raceId)
             throws ServiceException
        Adds horse with the specified id as a participant of the race with the specified id.
        Parameters:
        horseId - id of the horse that is to be a participant of the race
        raceId - id of the race where the horse is participating
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if a data source access error occurs

      • removeHorseFromRace

        void removeHorseFromRace(int horseId,
                         int raceId)
                  throws ServiceException
        Removes horse with the specified id from participants of the race with the specified id.
        Parameters:
        horseId - id of the horse that is to be removed from race's participants
        raceId - id of the race where the horse is no longer participating
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if a data source access error occurs

      • getUpcomingRaces

        java.util.List<Race> getUpcomingRaces()
                               throws ServiceException
        Returns list of races that are happening in the future(their date is after the current date).
        Returns:
        list of future races
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if a data source access error occurs

      • getUpcomingRacesWithoutOdds

        java.util.List<Race> getUpcomingRacesWithoutOdds()
                                          throws ServiceException
        Returns list of races that are happening in the future(their date is after the current date) and there are no odds for the horses that participate in them.
        Returns:
        list of future races without odds
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if a data source access error occurs

      • getPastRacesSubList

        java.util.List<Race> getPastRacesSubList(int indexFrom,
                                         int size)
                                  throws ServiceException
        Returns list of races that happened in the past(their date is before the current date) of size size starting from indexFrom position.

        The races are sorted in the descending order, meaning the latest ones are viewed first.

        Parameters:
        indexFrom - row number of the first requested race in the list
        size - amount of races to return
        Returns:
        list of past races
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if indexFrom or size are negative, if a data source access error occurs

      • getPastRacesTotalNumber

        int getPastRacesTotalNumber()
                     throws ServiceException
        Returns number of past races(their date is before current date) in the data source.
        Returns:
        number of records for past races in the data source
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if a data source access error occurs

      • getRaceById

        Race getRaceById(int raceId)
          throws ServiceException
        Returns Race object with the full information about the race from the data source.
        Parameters:
        raceId - id of the requested race
        Returns:
        race with the specified id
        Throws:
        ServiceException - if race with such id doesn't exist if a data source access error occurs
